title: Seattle City Council Public Safety & Human Services Committee 3/9/21
description:
In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28.15, until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.

Agenda: Call to Order, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Appointments and Reappointments to Community Police Commission; CB 120011: relating to appropriations for the Human Services Department - Community Safety Capacity Building Spending Plan; CB 119981: 2021 Budget.

Advance to a specific part
Public Comment - 1:57
Appointments and Reappointments to Community Police Commission - 32:25
CB 120011: relating to appropriations for the Human Services Department - 1:20:50
